Package org.consensusj.exchange

JavaMoney (JSR-354) support for Cryptocurrency exchanges

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExchangeRateObserver
    Implement this interface to register with ObservableExchangeRateProvider for rate updates TODO: Should we replace this with RxJava? Yes! Coming soon!
    ObservableExchangeRateProvider
    ExchangeRateProvider extension that allows an observer to be notified of exchange rate updates
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseXChangeExchangeRateProvider
    Base ExchangeRateProvider using XChange library Currently supports current DEFERRED rates only
    BaseXChangeExchangeRateProvider.MonitoredCurrency  
    CurrencyUnitPair
    Currency Pair using JavaMoney CurrencyUnit type
    DynamicXChangeRateProvider
    Generic XChange ExchangeRateProvider that can wrap any XChange class
    ExchangeRateChange
    Data object passed to ExchangeRateObserver on rate updates TODO: This should become a JavaMoney version of the XChange Ticker It should have the JavaMoney currency types, all the rates, An optional server timestamp and a mandatory client timestamp TODO: And it should probably be called "Update" rather than "Change" — if the timestamp was updated but the exchange rate didn’t, users still want to know.
